attributes.action: lower the driving age from 18 to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this should be done because it is not fair that we (the 16 year old's) have to wait a long time to start driving and it would make the 16 year old's feel more independent and we would have to get a job so that we could pay for our/there cars and they wouldn't 'SPONGE'of the tax payer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
